name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Dynamic Software Developer with 8 years of experience in crafting high-performance applications utilizing **.NET Core**, **C#**, **SQL Server**, **.NET Framework**, **MVC**, and **Entity Framework**. Skilled in developing Web Services that adhere to industry standards. Proven track record in time management, organizational skills, and a proactive attitude to ensure project delivery on schedule. Known for strong attention to detail and a willingness to learn and adapt in fast-paced environments.
Previously focused on full-stack development including **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**, with substantial cloud experience across **Azure** and **AWS**. Successfully led the development of enterprise-grade platforms that integrate AI/ML capabilities for predictive analytics and intelligent automation while ensuring compliance with standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Demonstrated expertise in microservices architecture, event-driven systems, and CI/CD automation, implementing machine learning pipelines and MLOps workflows using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
